typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CsvFileSource
CsvFileSource aggregate(groupBy(id),
	each(match(name!='id'), $$ = last($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates sort(asc(id, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
